usercssData.name: Stylus Dark - ShadowFox
usercssData.author: overdodactyl
usercssData.description: This theme is specifically designed to match the dark mode used by Firefox's inspector and browser toolbox (background colors, text colors in the editor, fonts etc.).  Additionally, it is meant to compliment [ShadowFox](https://github.com/overdodactyl/ShadowFox) - a universal dark theme for Firefox.   Hosted on GitHub (please submit any issues there): https://github.com/overdodactyl/Stylus-Dark

author: overdodactyl
description: This theme is specifically designed to match the dark mode used by Firefox's inspector and browser toolbox (background colors, text colors in the editor, fonts etc.).  Additionally, it is meant to compliment [ShadowFox](https://github.com/overdodactyl/ShadowFox) - a universal dark theme for Firefox.   Hosted on GitHub (please submit any issues there): https://github.com/overdodactyl/Stylus-Dark
name: Stylus Dark - ShadowFox

usercssData.name: Dark Instagram++
usercssData.author: Justin Ikeako
usercssData.description: Hey 👋🏽Dark Instagram++ is literally as the title says, a dark mode for the website Instagram lol. More features coming soon for sure. Feel free to suggest a change or give feedback. Both are really appreciated.Made with 💖by Justin Ikeako
